content:
Hello all,

On my spare time, I am working on http://refpersys.org with Indian friends - it is an ambitious AGI project as open source (actually GPLv3+ licensed) software (using metaknowledge and reflection, following the ideas of the late Jacques Pitrat).
(I got a PhD in AI in 1990 but now I am sadly working on cybersecurity at CEA, LIST)

Do you know of any tiny funding opportunities? Even a few kiloeuros to pay, for example, a travel from India to France, or just 1kâ‚¬ to send a desktop to India.

Do you know about any AI workshop in Europe where this work could be presented?

Please contact me by email to basile@starynkevitch.net since I read this forum quite rarely.

See also https://ai.stackexchange.com/q/18341/3335

Regards.

Basile Starynkevitch - http://starynkevitch.net/Basile/index_en.html
Bourg La Reine (France)

NB: this is unrelated to my work activities, funded by H2020 projects. Opinions are only mines, not shared by my employer (CEA, LIST)

What AI conferences in Europe should I consider submitting papers to explaining the ongoing work on RefPerSys?
https://afia.asso.fr/journee-hommage-j-pitrat/ is a seminar on March 6th, 2020, in Paris (France, European Union), in honor of the late Jacques Pitrat, who advocated during all his professional lif...
